divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my car and noticed a jet with a chem trail and then I seen a white dot cross paths but this object had no chem trail as it went the opposite direction at the same speed and faded away after less than a minute. I dont think it was a bird because it was too high and fast. I seen the same thing about a month ago in Lewisville but the object was following a jet real close for a couple minutes.
Summary: It passed a jet but this object had no chem trail and faded away.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bedford
There were no other sightings in Bedford on or around April 12th 2013
